name: AI Leadership
description: Learn how generative and agentic AI works at a practical level, apply it to real tasks, improve ideation and learning workflows, and define an ethics-informed approach to AI use.
learningObjectives: I can understand the basic math and science concepts that make generative and agentic AI tools work
I can use AI on appropriate tasks to do better work in less time with fewer resources.
I can use AI to generate multiple ideas and improve upon the best.
I can efficiently use & improve AI to learn new skills and integrate new tools as tech trend cycles evolve.
I understand major issues in AI ethics and take a clear stand on my personal approach to AI ethics.
